Bessie Risley

  1. Foster Name: Bessie
  2. Foster Family: William and Clara Zoeller
  3. Location of Family: Falls City, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: Lincoln, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: Unknown
  7. Date of Birth: , Canton, NY
  8. Gender: female
  9. Married Name: Bessie Malcolm
  10. Source: www.usgennet.org - Richard malcolm; 1920 United States Federal Census; Orphan Train Riders 50.
